VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Adriantown College?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Adriantown College is arc {Williams University}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Odonnell Laboratory?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Odonnell Laboratory is arc {Williams University}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Williams University} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Odonnell Laboratory} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Adriantown College to Royal Academy in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Odonnell Laboratory to Adriantown College in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Royal Academy and Odonnell Laboratory in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Royal Academy and Odonnell Laboratory is {25}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Adriantown College and Royal Academy in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Adriantown College and Royal Academy is {7}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Odonnell Laboratory?
SC.A: The total flow output from Odonnell Laboratory is {63}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by NIT?
SC.A: The total flow input by NIT is {30}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 24? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {31} from {Williams University} to {Odonnell Laboratory}, a flow of {25} from {Odonnell Laboratory} to {Royal Academy}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 11? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {10} from {NIT} to {Adriantown College}, a flow of {9} from {Adriantown College} to {Royal Academy}, a flow of {7} from {Royal Academy} to {Adriantown College}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 13 and 17? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {17} from {NIT} to {Williams University}, a flow of {15} from {Odonnell Laboratory} to {Adriantown College}, a flow of {14} from {Adriantown College} to {Odonnell Laboratory}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Adriantown College to Royal Academy or from Royal Academy to Adriantown College?
NC.A: The flow from {Adriantown College} to {Royal Academy} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Odonnell Laboratory to Royal Academy, from Adriantown College to Odonnell Laboratory, or from Adriantown College to NIT?
NC.A: The flow from {Odonnell Laboratory} to {Royal Academy} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Williams University}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Odonnell Laboratory} and {Williams University}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Odonnell Laboratory, Arc Williams University, Arc Royal Academy, Arc Adriantown College, Arc NIT}.
